.

Riviera Beach is a harbor city located along the shores of the Atlantic Ocean in Southeast Florida.  The 75 degree weather is year around and makes the beaches great for sporting events.

value: Taxi charge $2.50 base plus $2.65 per mile. You can choose from Lincoln Town Cars, to Dodge Caravans, and wheel chair assessable vehicles.
content=This place is great for rentals.  You can rent from a Waverunner, Craig Cat to a 26' inch boat.  They can take you on various tours and you even can learn how to water ski.
address=6566 N Military Trail, West Palm Beach

content=This water park is family orientated. There are 29 water slides from mild to wild and a little park for kids too.  There is a wave pool along with a lazy river. This park has two full service snack bars.  They serve chicken, hot dogs, nachos and more.
address=114 U.S Hwy One, Lake Park
content=This shop sells beach themes.  Flamingos, palm trees and many prints.  They have earrings, handbags,flip flops and even different types of clothing.  It also sells wooden signs with sayings.
address=200 East 13th St, West Palm Beach

content=An outdoor hut. The clientele ranges from bikers, boaters and families. They serve seafood, burgers and sandwiches. Lots of frozen drinks to match the laid-back outdoor atmosphere.  Friday and Saturday nights have live bands.
content=It is a casual, friendly place, and lots of locals eat there. European and Italian food are served and they have an extensive wine list, including grappas and ports.
address=2500 Broadway at 24th Street West Palm Beach
price=$5-$15, but they sell more bottles than drinks that range from $20-$65
content=It is an elegant place with high wood ceilings and it's original art by a local artist on the walls and clean.  They sell Lunch, Dinner, Bistros and of course drinks
address=3700 North Ocean Drive, Singer Island
content=Many different size rooms from standard doubles to junior king suites. Rooms include a walk out balcony, mini bar, work desk and a flat screen t.v. and the suites have a full ocean view.
